Health Care of Elderly II -Practicum
此課程旨在透過對老人健康照護政策、管理、策略及社區發展的理論、強化臨床
批判思考能力於老人相關研究與議題研討，增進學生對老人照護相關之管理、領
導、教育、諮商及決策判斷等能力。學生需統整及應用老人健康照護、經濟、主
要照顧者、社會支持、組織發展等理論研究於實務情境中，發揮其個案管理及團
體照護之功能，並需獨立針對特定議題運用批判思考完成專案報告以展現其老人
照顧專家的角色功能並能增進學生統合資源建立社區網絡之能力。
This course in designed to assist students acquiring ageing health policy, administration, strategy theory in the community nursing care of aging population. In this course, students are required self-direction learning, and will join an organization in community, interest to special issue and demonstrate the role functions of case manager in appropriate clinical settings.

Health Care of Children (II)
本課程在協助學生發展照顧由醫療機構至社區中具有健康問題兒童之進階護理能力。藉由相關理論及實證研究，探討不同發展階段中，具有特殊需求或高危險兒童所處的環境〈如：家庭、學校、社區〉對兒童生長發展的長期影響。內容並強調現有的醫療體系/健康政策、及社會資源與兒童及其家庭成員之間的相互影響，並從中思考所衍生的倫理議題。學生最終能具備統整知識及資源的能力並積極為個案及其家庭代言。
This course will explore the potential and existing issues derived from the children with health problems in the community. Based on the relevant theories and evidence based research findings, students will be able to 1) analyze the mutual influences among the children with health problems, their ecological systems and related health policies/ resources, 2) organize the client’s resources and develop effective plans in the care of children with health problems, and 3) act as advocates for the children when encountering the ethical issues.
全18週

Clinical practicum in Health Care of Children (II)
本課程旨在協助學生發展持續性且完整性的進階護理能力，提供個案及其家庭由醫療機構延續至社區中之照顧；藉由相關理論及實證研究，探討不同發展階段中，具有特殊需求或高危險兒童所處的環境〈如：家庭、學校、社區〉對其生長發展的長期影響。內容並強調現有的醫療體系/健康政策、及社會資源與兒童及其家庭成員之間的關係，並從中思考所衍生的倫理議題。學生能統整並運用知識及資源提供完整及持續性的照護。
This course is designed to assist students acquiring clinical expertise in the care of children with special needs or children at risk. Students are required to select an interested area to practice. By thoroughly assessing and analyzing the client’s situation (health, environment, health policies and resources), students will integrate the evidence based knowledge and provide the continuity care to the family of a child with special needs or at risk. The practices of self-directed learning, problem solving and critical thinking skills are highly expected in this course.

01
Independent Study
本課程以個別指導之形式，依據碩士生之護理專長背景及未來專業發展方向，引導學生探索相關核心概念、理論，結合其臨床專業技能，應用批判性思考及實證護理的概念，訂定研究方向及主題，擬定研究設計、完成研究計畫之書寫。
This course is delivered in an individualized format, tailored to the nursing specialization and future professional development of the master's student. It guides students in exploring relevant core concepts and theories, integrating their clinical expertise, applying critical thinking and evidence-based nursing concepts, determining research directions and topics, and developing research designs, culminating in the completion of a research proposal.
全18週

01
Advanced Psychiatric Mental Health Nursing (II)
本課程旨在昇化學生（1）人文關懷涵養；(2)擔任進階精神衛生護理師持續性照護之相關知能，課長包括探討進階精神衛生護理師的角色與功能、法律定位和業務範圍、個案的管理與轉介、護理標準的訂定、維持與評值、協調連繫與照會等；(3) 展現學生批判性及自我導向之學習歷程。學生藉著連結社區照護相關資源、執行家庭護理評估、帶領治療性團體、執行危機處理和溝通協商的演練以達成進階精神衛生護理師之培育目標。
This course is designed to help students to obtain advanced knowledge regarding (1) Life Concerns (2) roles and functions (3) ethics and legal issues of advanced psychiatric mental health nursing, (4) to apply group psychotherapy, family therapy and crisis interventions in the psychiatric mental health nursing (5) to perform critical thinking, ethics and decision making、collaboration with team work and long life learning.
全18週

Practicum on Advanced Psychiatric Mental Health Nursing (II)
本課程旨在促進學生勝任將進階精神衛生護理師持續性照顧之業務，採學習契約獲得主要學習經驗。主要內容包括：（1）生命關懷；(2)進階精神衛生護理師的角色與功能；(4) 法律定位和業務範圍；(4)運用團體治療、家庭治療及危機處置之理論及概念於精神衛生護理；(5)展現批判性思考、倫理與決策、團隊合作及終身學習。
This course is designed to help students to integrate related theories and clinical practice of advanced psychiatric mental health nursing, including (1) Life Concerns (2) roles and functions (3) ethics and legal issues of advanced psychiatric mental health nursing, (4) to apply group psychotherapy, family therapy and crisis interventions in the psychiatric mental health nursing (5) to perform critical thinking, ethics and decision making、collaboration with team members and long life learning.

Special Topic of Mindfulness Based Stress Reduction
本課程為正念減壓法的自我經驗課程，修習正念，是學習一種自覺的生活之道，透過有系統的學習專注呼吸、靜坐、身體掃描、正念瑜珈、生活禪、探索艱辛禪、正念人際關係、慈心禪等多元方法，學習與自己建立親密關係，增長自己與壓力共處的能力，重新接觸自己智慧與活力的泉源，培育更具靈性深度的專業助人能力。本課程也將引領學生認識正念的理論與研究，以發展學生應用正念減壓法在專業領域之學術研究能力。
This course focuses on the knowledge areas of hospice care , bereavement and aftercare issues. We expect students to understand a variety of caring-related issues. Thus, course content will focus on palliative care in a peaceful, recognizing the loss of life, deep sorrow, grief and mourning, the aftercare planning and practice, students' understanding of care planning and application.

Counseling Skills and Practice Seminar
本課程旨在藉由諮商歷程三階段假設的理論為主軸，運用探索、洞察及行動三階段論進行，在課程中不僅會運用過往所學習之諮商理論，更會進一步在課程中藉由與同儕的實務演練及課後的練習深入將理論與實務進行更為彈性的結合，每個單元將會以助人技巧三階段假設為主軸依序介紹在諮商輔導歷程之中不同階段的理論基礎架構，以及在助人歷程之中依據個案的不同特質與需求，以個案最大福祉為核心價值，彈性運用在本課程之中所學習到之技術，以更能貼近個案，並實際運用於爾後的諮商輔導實務工作之中，以發展諮商實務中有效的助人技能。

01
Seminar of Tourism, Food and Health
隨著國民健康意識抬頭，遊客旅遊時不再只是享受美食，如何吃得健康也是旅遊者關注的議題。由於旅遊時的飲食營養會影響遊客的健康與旅遊品質，因此本課程結合旅遊、餐飲、營養與飲食文化等內容，藉以討論旅遊之餐飲與健康。主要課程內容說明如下: (一)旅遊與營養:旅遊中六大類食物與營養素、營養標示、每日飲食指南與食物代換表在健康飲食上之應用; (二)旅遊餐飲衛生與安全:旅遊飲食衛生之注意事項與食物中毒之預防; (三)慢性疾病遊客之飲食:糖尿病、高血壓、高血脂、痛風、腎臟病等患者旅遊時之營養照顧; (四)飲食文化與營養:討論各國不同的飲食文化與餐食營養。
As people are becoming more health conscious, tourists are no longer just seeking for gourmet food while traveling, but also caring about healthy eating. Diet while travelling affects both health and travel quality. Therefore, this course combines information concerning travel, nutrition, health, and culture to explore the experience of enjoying food & beverages while traveling abroad. The main topics covered in this course are the followings: (1) Travel & Nutrition: The six essential categories of food and their nutritional content, introduction to nutritional labeling, and daily dietary guidelines; (2) Food & Beverage Sanitation and Safety While Travelling: Precautions for food hygiene and prevention of food poisoning while travelling; (3) Diet for Tourists with Chronic Diseases: Nutritional care for Tourists travelling with diabetes, hypertension, high cholesterol, gout, kidney or other diseases; (4) Food Culture and Nutrition: A discussion of different food cultures and the nutritional content of their diets.
全18週

Issue on travel medicine and health

This gateway course intentionally and extensionally highlights the overall & general figure of travel medicine and the impact on health. Through facilitating lectures and discussions, the learners could approach the concepts, values, principles and methods of the above topics, and increasingly understand the effects of travel and leisure toward health. Alongside, this course provides the students with a discussion on the current popular topics of health and tourism, and thus fulfills the one of the objectives of integrating theory and practice which is helpful in future studies and research for the students.

This course is designed to be interdisciplinary by integrating medical, nursing, psychological, social, and other aspects of long-term care perspectives. The course is aimed to delineate overall figure of defining, presenting, assessment, intervention, providing, and related issues of professional tasks and management, practices and delivery of Long-Term Care (support & protection, LTC). Along with the contemporary LTC, it encompassed the attainment of LTC team, skill & technology, assessment toolkit, care plan, care activity designing, quality control, and operating & managing, for the rooting and growing of care management, seed planting faculty & material, professional empowering and industry forming, rather, for related policy promotion campaign regarding LTC demand & supply, education & nurturing, advising & counseling, reviewing, and other necessary contextual factors.
For the application of this care approaching & intervention, to empower or fulfill this new field in the country, we expect the course will examine LTC related living & life, activity, participation and health (aging, morbidity, de-conditioning), contextual factors and corresponding approaching and intervention on various care clients／recipients, sites, role. Through understanding, handling, delivering, and creating care services potentially can make good use of available resources linking, to interact, and to integrate with all related professional disciplines involved. Through lectures, oral presentation and in-class discussion, the learners with the professional background or basis would be supposed to organize the knowledge, skill and value(principle) of care, ultimately to provide pertinent relationship, prediction, agreement, plan, choice of tactics….etc., and then closing anyway.

本課程旨在探討老化過程與老人族群相關之問題、事項及領域，主要的學習經驗在於熟悉老化及老人相關人口學、生物學、心理學、社會學及公共政策等內容，再由此進入老人學其他相關或延伸之領域。老人在各個層面發展衰退合併周邊人、事、物之討探與了解，其內容包括老人的身心社會及文化人文等綜合層面之本質與影響衝擊。老人之生理層面包含感官、知覺、健康情形、健康行為、失能、失智症等發展之特徵與相關議題；心理層面包含認知能力（智力、記憶、注意力、學習、和創造力等）、人格特質、精神違常、和壓力與調適、乃至於死亡與哀悼等；社會層面包含社會網絡、交友、婚姻關係、退休、休閒、居住安排、經濟狀況、照顧安排等發展之特徵與相關議題；另外，當還可能包含有靈性之層面。透過各層面及多元性教學與討論有助於了解掌握其潛在差異，如性別、族群、人生階段、互動、生活社會經驗方面之發展累積等，將有俾於了解老人多面及複雜之呈現。

本課程旨在協助學生了解醫護教育與訓練需求評估的目的、重要性及需求評估的方法，包括定義問題/目的、適當選擇需求評估的方法、發展基本的需求評估的工具、收集及分析需求評估的資料、報告需求分析的結果，並完成一份醫護教育與訓練之需求評估專案報告。
This course aims to teach students the objectives, importance, and methods of training needs assessment in allied health education. The process of needs assessment composed of defining problems and goals, selecting optimal methods, developing basic tools, collecting and analyzing data, and reporting results. After finishing this course,students will apply the theory and methods to conduct an educational needs assessment and make an academic presentation.

01
Data management and statistical analysis in medical research
本課程透過課程講授、實際練習操作統計套裝軟體及實例研討等方法，著眼於資料管理與統合各種量性資料分析方法之實務操作，目標在於提昇學生管理與分析統計相關資料之能力。課程中將運用 SPSS 統計套裝軟體來學習以下統計資料管理與分析策略，如建立資料檔案並進行資料檔案之增刪、編輯與修改；著手分析健康照護相關之研究資料、繪製資料圖表；運用描述性與推論性統計策略；撰寫研究資料之分析結果。
The objective of this course is to provide students with practical applications of bio-statistical methods by running the SPSS statistical software. Two sample data (depression data and factor analysis data) in the health related agendas will demonstrate and analyze effectively. Major topics and headings will include (1) overview of SPSS statistical software, (2) data arrangement (3) descriptive statistics, (4) analysis of variance, (5) simple regression analysis and correlation, (6) multiple regression analysis and correlation, (7) category data analysis,
(8) logistic regression analysis, and (9) repeated measurement based on the applied consideration of medical science. The advance ability toward the management of quantity data will be the core of teaching plan and interactive procedure. The aims of this course are to promote and reinforce students actually understand the whole-spectrum of basic statistics and its practical directions.
全18週

Academic Writing for Publication
學術論文寫作主要協助學生培養縝密的思考及良好的寫作組織能力。教學重點，包括學術寫作的基本原理及結構、句子段落寫作、文章連貫性，以及學術寫作最常運用的寫作方法，同時搭配適當的討論與寫作練習，架構研究問題、形塑研究假說、收集並歸納研究議題相關之背景知識與現存之科學證據，進而對於現有之科學證據進行系統性支評析與回顧，評斷先前所提出之臨床問題之合宜性，並以科學原則修正。希望能透過課程設計，幫助學生練習寫作策略與技巧，引導學生基於上述之科學原則以符合學術研究倫理之方式適切的撰寫學術文章。
This course aimed at guiding the class attendants to formulate practical problems into study propositions and hypothesis with the emphasis on scientific and logical principles. The primary teaching focus includes the basic principles of academic writing and structure,sentence paragraph writing, article coherence, and most commonly used writing methods in academic writing. Through the curriculum design, we will help students to practice writing strategies and skills and guide students to familiarize the fundamental requirement of thesis writing.

Traditional Chinese Health Preservation and Application
本課程旨在培養學生中西醫結合專業照護、科技知能應用、批判性思考、溝通合作、跨文化照護結合能力。課程內容在介紹中醫養生學之學理與實證實務照護應用，包括中醫學、藥食同源藥膳養生、經絡穴位按摩與推拿、氣功、求卜問卦、收驚等。
This course is designed to establish competences of traditional Chinese medicine with Western nursing care, applications of science theories, critical thinking, communication and cooperation, and cross-cultural care. This course provides students to have the concepts of theories and evidence-based nursing practical application of Chinese medicine life cultivation, including traditional Chinese medicine, Chinese herbal medicine life cultivation, meridian and acupoint application, Chinese tuina and massage, qigong, Chinese astrology, and Chinese style exorcise.

Research Methodology
本課程旨在培養學生對專業問題質疑，以科學方法來設計合宜解決之道。主要學習經驗包括專業現況的質疑、邏輯推理的練習、文獻的查證和組織、研究的設計、研究計畫的撰述等活動。學習者將透過討論與主題相關的作業之落實，來增進對研究主題可行性的評估能力。
The aim of this course is to enhance the inquisitiveness of students towards the nursing problem and enhance their competencies in problem solving by adopting scientific approaches. The research process will be the focus of the course content. Students will read and criticize research articles intensively throughout the semester. At the end of the course, students will demonstrate research competencies by presenting a research proposal and critiquing proposals of others in class.
Objective
1.	develop an inquisitive attitude towards nursing issues and problems.
2.	review, integrate and synthesize literatures to formulate a conceptual framework appropriate for the  research proposal to be presented in class.
3.	critique selected research articles/papers in terms of problem statement, literature reviews, research methods and conclusions and implications.
4.	develop appropriate research design for the proposed research.
5.	present and critique the research proposal.
全18週

Nutrition in Chinese Medicine
藥膳學在中醫基礎理論指導下，將中草藥與食物相配伍，運用傳統之飲食烹調技術和現代加工方法製成味、色、形具佳的及更有保健和治療作用之食品，其內容廣泛，迄今已有三千年之歷史，所謂藥食同源更是集中而深刻的體現了藥膳之重要性，而其藥膳成分對於人體自律神經及自由基及體內自泌素之影響更是本科目之重點研究。本課程共分: 藥膳概論、穀物湯膳與研究、蔬菜湯膳與研究、果品湯膳與研究、畜肉湯膳與研究、海鮮湯膳與研究、藥草湯膳與研究和美容養生湯膳與研究從營養角度看食品安全問題、食品添加物的聰明選擇、自然食材及添加物的應用等.

本課程旨在培育成人專科護理師學生具備照護急性住院病人常見健康需求之進階知識與技能，並加強其對對專科護理師角色、功能與執業議題之瞭解。課程強調運用批判性思維與實證醫學和護理，以建立適當之健康問題診斷、處置和評價照護結果之學習。透過講述、學生課堂導讀、案例分析、小組討論、角色扮演、影片情境分析與數位平台討論等多元教學策略，訓練學生批判性思維考、溝通與自學能力，並培養學生具備成人專科護理師入門所需之知識與技能，使其能以專科護理師的角色提供急性住院病人適切之進階護理照護。
This course provides the student with in-depth knowledge of common clinical situations in acute care setting. The role and function of the acute care nurse practitioner will be integrated throughout the course. Emphasis is on the utilization of critical thinking and evidence-based practice to formulate diagnoses and management and evaluation plans of care for physiologically unstable adult patients who have health problems, and are at high risk for developing complications. The focus is on the management of specific system problems of acute care. This course provides students with fundamental knowledge necessary to deliver advanced nursing care in acute care settings.
全18週

Adult Practice Nursing I - Practicum
本實習課程旨在培育成人專科護理師學生，照護急性住院病人常見健康需求，展現入門之專科護理師角色與功能，應用進階之護理知識與技能於提供病情單純之成人病患照護，並對專科護理師常見之執業議題有初步瞭解。實習強調運用批判性思維與實證醫學和護理，以建立適當之健康問題診斷、處置和評價照護結果於所照護之個案。透過實習契約書之訂定、實習指導教師與實習教學教師的共同輔導、實習日誌、個案報告、互動記錄、鑑別診斷形成與問題解決過程報告、與實習心得的完成，以確保學生的實習經驗，至實習結束每位學生將至少照護十位內外科常見之急性住院病人，以培養學生具備成人專科護理師入門所需之知識與技能，使其能以專科護理師的角色提供病情單純之急性住院病人適切之進階護理照護。
This course provides the student to apply knowledge of advanced nursing management in acutely ill adults. Emphasis is on the utilization of critical thinking and evidence-based practice to formulate diagnoses and management and evaluation plans of care for physiologically unstable adult patients who have health problems, and are at high risk for developing complications. The focus is on the management of specific system problems of acute care. This course provides students to apply fundamental knowledge necessary to deliver advanced nursing care in acute care settings.
全18週

Health Care of Elderly I
此課程旨在透過對老人老化及疾病相關之病理、生理、心理、情緒及靈性需求之理論、研究與議題研討，增進學生老人照護的臨床專業能力。學生需統整及應用老人疾病照護、經濟、主要照顧者、社會、組織、資源整合、臨終照護等理論研究於臨床實務中，發揮個案照護之功能，並需針對特定議題完成方案以展現其老人臨床照護專家的角色及功能。
This course in designed to assist students acquiring clinical expertise in the nursing care of healthy aging population with specified health problems. Theories, research, and issues relevant to normal developmental transitions and changes in aging will be discussed. Emphasis is placed on physiological, psychological, family-social-cultural-environmental, spiritual, and functional aspects related to nursing interventions with the healthy aging population. Students are expected to develop a preliminary conceptual model to explain a clinical phenomenon involving healthy aging and its implication in nursing.
全18週

Health Care of Elderly I - Practicum ( 144hours )
此實習旨在透過對老化及疾病相關之生理、病理、心理社會及靈性需求之理論、並配合應用口述歷史進行老人生命回顧之研討，學生需同時統整及應用老人疾病照護、主要照顧者、社會組織、資源整合、臨終照護等理論於臨床實務中，發揮個案照護之功能。學生並透過自我導向之學習，於醫療照護機構及社區情境中完成獨立提供老人連續性健康照護，以期展現老人照護專業角色功能及實務能力。
This course in designed to assist students acquiring clinical expertise in the nursing care of healthy aging population with specified health problems. In this course, students are required to select a problem or an issue discussed in the seminar, and complete the nursing process through integration and application of the theories for selected clients in appropriate clinical settings. Students are expected to develop a preliminary conceptual model to explain a clinical phenomena involving aging and its implications in nursing. Problem solving and critical thinking skills of students will be enhanced by the teaching strategy in this course.

Health Care of Children (I)
本課程在協助學生發展兒童健康照護之進階護理能力。內容強調兒童於成長環境中危險及保護因子的評估，及身體評估、諮詢、教育、溝通、照護決策等相關進階能力之培養。由發展、家庭、環境等相關理論的角度，引導同儕關懷並深入探討出生至青春期住院兒童的相關健康議題；學生藉由自我主導學習統整學理及實證研究運用於住院兒童照顧實務上。
This course focuses on two populations, the families with children at risk and the families with hospitalized children. Through the research findings of different approaches, such as risk and resilience, development, family, and ecology, students will expand their views to assess the child’s environment and the related health issues. Advanced professional competence in the care of the pediatric population will be highly emphasized in this course.
全18週

Research Methods and Design in Nursing
本課程的內容訓練學生如何做一個科學性的研究，必須有一套訓練的方法，舉凡在如何尋找問題，如何解決問題，如何搜集資料，如何分析資料等都需要有一套嚴謹的方法論，最後介紹研究報告、論文之撰寫。
Methods and strategies applicable to nursing research will be examined and evaluated. Criteria will be presented to review research for scientific and clinical merits. The major focus of the course will be the participation of the student in all phases of the research process using a computer to simulate data or to help in the analysis an actual data set.

01
Advanced Psychiatric Mental Health Nursing (I)
本課程旨在培育學生具有（1）人文關懷涵養；（2）進階精神衛生護理師專業知能，包括照顧、溝通、專業及自我成長、管理等能力。主要學習經驗包括進階精神疾病個案護理經驗、個人和團體心理治療、治療性環境經營管理等；（3）引導學生進行批判性及自我導向之終生學習歷程，藉著整合自己之精神衛生護理之學理和臨床經驗，增強照護個案治療的知能，以及與醫療團隊的溝通協調。
The purposes of the course are (1) to develop person-center nursing care; (2) to have advanced psychiatric-mental health knowledge and skills, including those of nursing, communication, specialty, self-growth, management, etc. (The major learning experiences include those of advanced psychiatric mental health nursing, individual and group psychotherapy and management of treatment environment, etc.)；(3) to guide students to critique and self-directed learning in order to associate with psychiatric-mental health knowledge and clinical experiences, to develop knowledge and skills of nursing, to practice crisis intervention and to promote communication and coordination of medical teams.
全18週

Adult Practice Nursing II - Practicum
本課程旨在培育成人專科護理師學生，具備病情嚴重病人急性醫療照護之進階知識與技能，並加強其對對專科護理師執業議題之瞭解。實習課程強調運用批判性思維與實證醫學和護理，以建立適當之健康問題診斷、處置和評價照護結果於所照護之個案。透過實習契約書之訂定、實習指導教師與實習教學教師的共同輔導、個案報告、臨床照護指引與實習心得的完成，以確保學生的實習經驗，至實習結束每位學生將至少照護十位內外科病情嚴重病人，以培養學生具備成人專科護理師所需之知識與技能，使其能以專科護理師的角色提供病情嚴重之急性醫療病人適切之進階護理照護。
The course is a continuum of the clinical practicum for adult health nursing I. The purposes of the course are (1) to train students’ competencies in assessing, diagnosing, examining, and managing common medical and surgical health problems, (2) to facilitate students’ consultation ability for emotional responses of acute ill patients, (3) to cultivate students’ case management ability, (4) to increase students’ communication and collaboration to achieve excellent care, and (5) to be familiar with ethical and legal issues affecting NP practice in Taiwan.. Within the practicum, student will demonstrate actual roles and responsibilities of an acute care nurse practitioner.

Qualitative Research
本課程旨在提供學生認識質性研究及其在護理上的運用。課程內容包括質性研究概念的介紹、研究設計、資料的收集與詮釋、以及報告的撰寫。本課程藉由課堂講授，輔以論文研討等方式帶領學生認識質性研究方法，並探討其在應用上的重要議題，以輔助學生在閱讀及使用質性研究方法的能力
This course focuses on the basic of qualitative research and its applications in the
nursing field. The contents of this course include qualitative perspective on research,
qualitative research design, qualitative data collection and analysis, and qualitative
research reporting, etc. The major issues for utilizing qualitative research methods will
be also discussed in this course. Lecture and discussion will be used as the teaching
strategies. Students will be able to read and apply qualitative research critically.

01
Evidence-based Health-care and Application
本課程主要協助學生瞭解護理之實證研究與實證實務，期使學生能在實證之理論與研究上有所認識，而應用於臨床有關健康照護，以增進學生健康照護之護理實證實務能力。課程內容包含實證相關之理論與研究以及實務層面，例如臨床決策之評量、質量性研究之評量、實證研究問題之發展、發展搜尋策略、研究品質之評量、發展實證護理研究計畫等。
This course provides students to have the concepts of evidence-based nursing for research and
practice in healthcare. The major focus of the course encompasses the understanding of the issues
about evidence-based research and practical application through the participation, presentation, and
discussion in the class.
全18週

This course is structured as individualized instruction, aiming to assist the master's student in utilizing clinical practice as a foundation. The Ergonomics Project of Health Care
本課程主要探討健康照護及日常生活中，人們所使用的物品及環境的實務設計創作，透過人因工程之介紹與護理實務所發現之問題結合，以分組討論與設計製作的方式，讓健康照護需求透過設計探討將之落實，期使理論能與實務相互結合外並希望藉由跨學門之不同經驗與專長解決健康照護職場之相關健康照護設計。

01
Health Care of Adult I
本課程旨在增進學生照護成人健康之護理專業能力。成人病患常見的健康問題之臨床實務面，學生須統整並運用所學之內外科護理學、生理病理學、病因學、臨床診斷學、身體評估以及管理學等相關理論。藉由整合學理和臨床實務，學生能增強成人個案照護與治療等相關的學理，且能展現醫療團隊的溝通協調，以達成本課程的目標。
The purpose of the course is to advance the clinical professional competence in acute care setting. Students will be able to apply knowledge and theories of medical-surgical nursing, patho-physiology, etiology, clinical diagnosis, physical assessment, and management. Nursing Information Management I
本課程旨在於提升學生瞭解護理資訊管理相關理論與概念架構及其應用，學生能瞭解護理資訊學於臨床照護、管理、教學及研究上的使用情況。課程內容包括護理資訊管理專業人員在護理科技運用之選擇考量、及教育訓練過程與臨床照護使用的評值、旁及於有關電子化護理照護及護理資訊實務的範疇及標準。
The purpose of this course is to assist students in identifying the major theories and models of information management within nursing practice. Students will be able to understand the application of nursing informatics on clinical care, education, research and management. The nursing information specialist roles in the system selection and evaluation, education strategies, technology use in care evaluation, and the introduction of e-nursing is also included. Additionally, the future trends of the development of nursing informatics scope and standards of practice are identified as well.

Practicum of Nursing Information Management I
此課程旨在使學生能應用護理資訊管理學於臨床科技使用之情境分析。學生需瞭解資訊科技如何運用於臨床病人照護，並分析相關臨床照護資訊科技使用之議題。同時，學生需應用相關護理資訊管理理論與概念架構於一特定護理科技應用系統分析與設計，並探討護理資訊護如何滿足臨床照護者、護理管理者、護理教育者及其未來發展；旁及於參與系統使用過程的教育訓練與評值、及瞭解系統設計如何受到健康照護潮流衝擊的影響。
This course provides students an opportunity to analyze the current situations of nursing information management. Learning activities include applying a related theory or concept analysis in design and development of a project to investigate a nursing information technology application on meeting identified needs and trends in nursing students, clinicians, administrators, nursing faculty and patients and families. Students will participate in planning, education and evaluation of the implementation of a nursing information system, and to identify the impact of selected trends on the design of nursing information systems. Students will also address current and future clinical issues on selected nursing information technologies on health care.

Independent Study

This course is delivered in an individualized format, tailored to the nursing specialization and future professional development of the master's student. It guides students in exploring relevant core concepts and theories, integrating their clinical expertise, applying critical thinking and evidence-based nursing concepts, determining research directions and topics, and developing research designs, culminating in the completion of a research proposal.

本課程以個別指導之形式，依據碩士生之護理專長背景及未來專業發展方向，引導學生探索相關核心概念、理論，結合其臨床專業技能，應用批判性思考及實證護理的概念，訂定研究方向及主題，擬定研究設計、完成研究計畫之書寫。
This course is delivered in an individualized format, tailored to the nursing specialization and future professional development of the master's student. It guides students in exploring relevant core concepts and theories, integrating their clinical expertise, applying critical thinking and evidence-based nursing concepts, determining research directions and topics, and developing research designs, culminating in the completion of a research proposal.
全18週

01
Thesis
本課程以個別指導之形式，旨在協助碩士生以臨床實務為基礎，應用護理理論及研究能力，執行研究計畫，進行資料分析，並完成研究成果報告及碩士論文之撰寫。
This course is structured as individualized instruction, aiming to assist the master's student in utilizing clinical practice as a foundation. It focuses on the application of nursing theory and research skills, the execution of research protocol, data analysis, and the completion of research outcome reports and the master's thesis.
